txt.en: Halbarad weaves a tale of dread.
'Dúnedain! Do not give in to fear!'
Fight alongside the Dúnedain as if you had been there
'Go back, vile creatures! And never return!'
Halbarad has agreed to tell you of the night Sarn Ford was attacked.
Talk to Halbarad and hear his tale

'My own heart was seized by a terrible foreboding, but I had the duty of command and would not abandon it. I want you to know this, [placeholder], before I tell you the events that followed: these men and women that stood with me on that night... there was not a single drop of cowardice among them.\n\n'But we had no idea what we would face on that night.'
Instance: Night Falls On Sarn Ford
Halbarad weaves a tale of dread.
